Project.Brief history of your project and organi: I'm a member of greatdata. We have 30 members in total and 5 servers. We mainly provide service about storing data, enterprise and individual. NCAR is a center of research excellence in Earth system science sponsored by the National Science Foundation. NCAR was established by the National Science Foundation in 1960 to provide the university community with world-class facilities and services that were beyond the reach of any individual institution.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Data from ARISE-SAI Experiments with CESM2.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
Tooling: Lotus, servers, harddisks.
Details: We use lotus to convert data into car files. Then we transfer these files to sps.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Cloud storage (i.e. S3), HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives, Lotus built-in data transfer
